nodes.text: Would you like to have this lovely beaded necklace I found? It would look great with your eye color.
You're quite the charmer, aren't you, Shawn? Thank you, but no... I'll not be taking such a gift.
I found this strange book... I'm not sure what to do with it. I wondered if you would like to have it, seeing as you are a Paladin.
You're right to give this to me. There's foul magic radiating from it. I'll find a way to destroy this thing before it can do any more Evil.
I found this very rare and wonderful Dryad's Kiss wine, and I'd like you to have it because you are every bit as rare and wonderful as it is.
'tis a fine gift, indeed. Thank you, Shawn, but it's not seemly that I take such a thing from you.
I came across this Healing Potion and I wondered if you needed it for the infirmary.
Thank you, Shawn. I do make Healing Potions here and normally I have enough for emergencies, but some of my supplies are missing. This could be a life saver.
'Tis kind of you to offer this potion, Shawn, but I think that you might need it more than I do. I make these potions here. You can learn how to make them yourself if you take the First Aid class.
I found this fine wine and I wondered if you would like to have it?
Normally, I wouldn't think of taking such a gift from a student...
However, fine wine is a major component for Healing Potions. There's always a need for such potions around here. So thank you, I'll be putting it to good use.
Thank you, Shawn. The potion I make from this may save someone's life.
I thought you might like some of this golden wine I found. It's like liquid sunshine, and there's no one sunnier around here than you.
'tis sweet that you have the gift for kind words and deeds, Shawn. That being said, this is not fitting to give such a fine wine to me.
I found this book of Love Ballads I thought immediately of you. Would you like to have it?
Love ballads, is it now? Next thing I know, you'll be serenading me outside my window.
You're a dear, but Shawn, I'll not be your sweetie. Save that gift for a bard or book lover.
Lady Moira, you are the most amazing person I've ever met. I'd like you to have this ring as a token of my love for you.
Shawn O'Conner, if I ever gave you the impression that you were anything more to me than a good student, I'm sorry.
Keep your ring. Maybe one day, you'll meet a sweet colleen who loves you dearly.
I picked this beautiful rose for a beautiful lady.
'tis a sweet gesture, Shawn. I've a fondness for roses. That's why so many of them grow around this castle.
Thank you, Shawn.

options.text: Offer the Way of the Paladin Book

nodes.text: I came across this forgotten book in a dusty corner of the castle, and I thought you might like it, what with you being a Paladin and all.
Why, 'tis an old version of the "Way of the Paladin!" It is a rare treasure, indeed.
Thank you, Shawn. You are a rare treasure, as well.
